Name: Rush Hour® Deluxe – The ultimate traffic jam game!
About the game: Can you skilfully manoeuvre the red car out of the traffic jam? Slide the vehicles blocking it in their lanes forwards and backwards – until the road ahead is clear for the red car! Not only can you play Rush Hour® Deluxe alone, but go head-to-head with other players to measure your brainpower: who will solve the challenges in the quickest time and with the fewest moves? With the original design of the successful board game Playful logical brain training 60 challenges 5 difficulty levels Play alone or locally with up to 4 players (requires up to 3 additional game controllers) Great animations and effects
